    • viewWeek

      public void viewWeek(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      This method sets the flag of isMonth to false. Allows for information to be passed to the advance/regress view window and changes TableView to reflect on current view.

      actionEvent - Triggers upon switching of the radiobutton.

    • viewMonth

      public void viewMonth(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException

      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Triggers upon switching of the radiobutton.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • regressView

      public void regressView(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      This method regresses the selected date. Regresses the date by either one month or one week, to change TableView to reflect on current view.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Triggers upon pressing the regress button.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • advanceView

      public void advanceView(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      This method advances the selected date. Advances the date by either one month or one week, to change TableView to reflect on current view.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Triggers upon selecting a date on the advance button.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • exitWindow

      public void exitWindow(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException

    • searchForAppointments

      public void searchForAppointments(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      This method searches for appointments at the selected date. Checks if viewing by month/week and then looks for appointments after the found date.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Triggers upon selecting a date on the dateFinder.
      Throws:
      SQLException
